sentences.en: A gifted rendition of the aria.
sentences.cn: 极富天赋的咏叹调的演唱.

sentences.en: Compared with offsctdruckereien bishan, there are differences in the following areas: 1. can the color rendition.

sentences.en: He gave a moving rendition of Lennon’s ‘Imagine’.
sentences.cn: 他深情地演唱了列侬的《想象》。

sentences.en: He is renowned for his rendition of Tchaikovsky.
sentences.cn: 他以演奏柴可夫斯基的作品而著名.

sentences.en: Her rendition of milton's verse was extraordinarily moving.
sentences.cn: 她对密尔顿诗歌的演绎令人感动.

sentences.en: His rendition brought tears to my eyes.
sentences.cn: 他的演唱使我伤心落泪.

sentences.en: It did not seem to matter that my rendition was lacking in style.
sentences.cn: 他似乎并不在乎我的演奏风格全无.

sentences.en: New singers whose voices typify different feelings sing old songs again as their own rendition.
sentences.cn: 新歌手用他们不同的嗓音唱出不同味道的歌曲.

sentences.en: Not to be outdone, Luke began to chime in with his own rendition.
sentences.cn: 为了不落下风, 卢克开始了他自己相应的表演.

sentences.en: Often imitations are extended to provide a more accurate rendition of the child's intended meaning.
sentences.cn: 儿童的模仿行为通常被详加解读,用来准确诠释他们的真实想法.

sentences.en: She gave a splendid rendition of the song.
sentences.cn: 这首歌她唱得动听极了.

sentences.en: She lifted her voice during her rendition of the classic opera song.
sentences.cn: 表演古典歌剧时,她提高了嗓门放声歌唱.

sentences.en: These factors can affect the spot color business card printing and membership card fabrication rendition.
sentences.cn: 这些因素都会影响专色制卡和会员卡制作过程中的色彩再现.

sentences.en: They gave an excellent rendition of a Beethoven symphony.
sentences.cn: 他们将贝多芬的一篇交响曲演译得很优秀.

sentences.en: They heard a live rendition of three pieces by schubert.
sentences.cn: 他们聆听了乐队对三首舒伯特的作品的生动演绎.

sentences.en: This film will give prints better contrast and more accurate color rendition.
sentences.cn: 这底片将使照片具有更好的明暗对比和更逼真的色彩.
